title: Request for Dua for Exam Results || assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: faizan from India first of all thank you to you I can't thank you enough because I had OCD and you and by with the help of your videos I am record alhamdulillah 100 questions Allah's favor and blessing upon you from Allah alone yes sir I already told you I almost did a sound eight months ago and nevertheless I had I have right now another question don't not a question but I have a request to you yes sir I already told you on uh WhatsApp that I had some medical listening examination in India to pray for me and I know you would be busy and you can't reply for that so right now I'm requesting you my result will be declared within some days so I want you to please pray for me specifically so that I can be selected for that exam first of all faizan I receive thousands of what's up requests and questions and I don't have the time to reply to them nevertheless I remember seeing your message if I'm not mistaken twice and I did make Dua but I don't reply to imagine I have millions of people following me on Instagram YouTube Twitter Facebook whatever if everyone and people have my number if everyone sends me something or at least salaam alaikum and expects me to reply to him I wouldn't be able to eat because I would run out of time so I did make Dua to you and I'm once again doing Dua to you again may Allah azzawajal make you achieve the highest uh marks in your examination pass with uh um uh more than what you have expected uh and Allah Knows Best [Music] um and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days and the evening I will try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
